title: Music genres preferred by consumers in the U.S. 2018
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Rock has the highest Share of respondents and Other has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 47.5.
min_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 56.8 is found at Response Rock and the minimum is found at Other where Response is 9.3.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Rock has the highest Share of respondents and Other has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 47.5.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 15 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Rock and lowest at Response Other.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 47.5.
The Response Rock has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Pop, and Country. Down to the Response Other which is the lowest.
The Response Other tends to be 2.04 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 417.4.
